reviews.subject: Cryptography
reviews.review: Dr. Turing's insights into code-breaking are mind-blowing. His historical anecdotes make the class unforgettable.

reviews.subject: Radiochemistry
reviews.review: Brilliant lecturer, but the lab work can be intimidating. Proper safety protocols are strictly enforced.

reviews.subject: Astrophysics
reviews.review: His enthusiasm for space is contagious! The planetarium sessions are a highlight of the course.

reviews.subject: Primatology
reviews.review: Her firsthand experiences with chimps bring the subject to life. Field trip to the local zoo was eye-opening.

reviews.subject: Quantum Mechanics
reviews.review: Incredibly complex subject matter. Dr. Hawking's explanations are clear, but the math is challenging.

reviews.subject: Linguistics
reviews.review: Thought-provoking lectures that challenge your understanding of language. Heavy reading list, but worth it.

reviews.subject: Genetics
reviews.review: Her research on gene regulation is fascinating. The corn breeding experiment was a semester highlight.

reviews.subject: Theoretical Physics
reviews.review: Makes mind-bending concepts accessible. His predictions about future tech are particularly intriguing.

reviews.subject: 19th Century Literature
reviews.review: Insightful analysis of period novels. The mock tea party helped understand social contexts of the era.

reviews.subject: Web Technologies
reviews.review: Who better to learn web dev from than the inventor of the World Wide Web? Inspiring and practical.
